name: Stevanato Group S.p.A.
description: Stevanato Group S.p.A. is a leading global provider of drug delivery systems and other healthcare solutions. Founded in 1949 in Italy, the company specializes in the design, production, and supply of glass primary packaging for pharmaceuticals, as well as engineered systems for drug delivery. Stevanato's innovative products include vials, syringes, and cartridges that are essential for the safe and effective delivery of medications. With over 70 years of experience, Stevanato Group has established itself as a trusted partner for pharmaceutical companies worldwide, providing high-quality solutions that meet stringent regulatory standards. The company is also focused on digital health and advanced manufacturing technologies, aiming to enhance the efficiency and safety of drug delivery. Through continuous investment in research and development, Stevanato Group is committed to improving patient outcomes and supporting the evolving needs of the healthcare industry. With a strong global presence, the company operates manufacturing facilities and offices across Europe, North America, and Asia, enabling it to serve its customers effectively and efficiently.

seo.meta_title: Stevanato Group S.p.A. | Drug Delivery Systems and Healthcare Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Stevanato Group S.p.A., a leading provider of drug delivery systems and healthcare solutions. Explore our innovative products and commitment to patient safety.

faq.question: What does Stevanato Group specialize in?
faq.answer: Stevanato Group specializes in drug delivery systems and glass primary packaging for pharmaceuticals.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Stevanato Group?
faq.answer: Carlo Stevanato is the CEO of Stevanato Group S.p.A.

faq.question: Where is Stevanato Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Stevanato Group is headquartered in Pisa, Italy.

faq.question: What are the main products of Stevanato Group?
faq.answer: Stevanato Group's main products include vials, syringes, and cartridges for drug delivery.
